DOC.detailed_description: Functional dyspepsia ( FD ) functional gastrointestinal disorder without structural lesion . Due lack satisfactory effect conventional treatment , many FD patient turn alternative treatment acupuncture . Acupuncture , one seek therapeutic modality traditional Korean Medicine , commonly use treat gastrointestinal disorder . However , effect mechanism acupuncture FD rigorously evaluate . In present study , investigate whether 10 session acupuncture 4 week , comparison sham acupuncture , improve symptom FD activate region brain area . We also perform metabolomics study find mechanism acupuncture FD . Outcome measure include proportion responder , Korean version Nepean Dyspepsia Index , Functional Dyspepsia-Related Quality Life , Ways Coping Question , Coping Strategy Questionnaire , Perception bodily sensation , The State-Trait Anxiety Inventory , Center Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale , functional magnetic resonance image metabolomic study .
